## Filter by Dry nature

```{r}
DryNaturePlots <- readRDS("DryNaturePlot.rds")  %>%
  sf::st_transform('+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84')
```

* only `r prettyNum(nrow(DryNaturePlots), big.mark = ",")` of the plots are dry Nature

```{r}
leaflet(DryNaturePlots) %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
```

## Select by higher diversity

* Select highest (Diversity, species richness and Artscore)
* Ensure 10 km minimum distance to closest neighbour
* Compute 
    + Patch area [ha]
    + Mean proportion of Dry Nature (500, 1000, 5000, 10000)
    + CV of dry nature
* Only for habitats with more than 5 occurrences

## Proportion vs CV

```{r}
Summary <- readRDS("Summary.rds")
MoreThanFive <- Summary %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  dplyr::filter(nature_dry_cv < median(Summary$nature_dry_cv)) %>% 
  replace(is.na(.), 0) %>%
  group_by(habitat) %>%
  summarise(n = n()) %>%
  dplyr::filter(n > 5) %>%
  arrange(desc(n))


G <- ggplot(Summary, aes(x = nature_dry_mean, y = nature_dry_cv)) + geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_hline(yintercept = median(Summary$nature_dry_cv), lty = 2, color = "red") +
  labs(y = "Coefficient of variation of Nature dry", x = "Average proportion of nature dry")

ggplotly(G)
```

## Nature types

```{r}
Summary2 <- Summary %>% dplyr::filter(habitat %in% MoreThanFive$habitat, nature_dry_cv < median(Summary$nature_dry_cv))

G2 <-  ggplot(Summary2, aes(x = reorder(habitat, nature_dry_mean), y = nature_dry_mean)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Habitat", y = "Average proportion of nature dry")

ggplotly(G2)
```

## Candidate points

```{r}
Candidates <- readRDS("Candidates.rds") %>% ungroup() %>% dplyr::filter(habitat %in% MoreThanFive$habitat) %>% dplyr::select("akt_id", "year", "habitat", "Patch_Size", "sp_richness", 
"nature_dry_mean", "nature_dry_cv", "lake_mean", "lake_cv","forest_mean", "forest_cv", "agriculture_intensive_temporary_crops_mean", "agriculture_intensive_temporary_crops_cv", 
"agriculture_intensive_permanent_crops_mean",
"agriculture_intensive_permanent_crops_cv", "lon", "lat")
```


* Among the most common habitats (More than five)
* Coefficient of variation lower than `r round(median(Summary$nature_dry_cv),2)`
* Total number `r nrow(Candidates)`

## Map Candidates

```{r}
labels <- paste(
    "<strong>Habitat: </strong>", Candidates$habitat,"<br>", "<strong>Species richness: </strong>", Candidates$sp_richness,"<br>", "<strong>Patch size: </strong>", Candidates$Patch_Size,"<br>") %>%
    lapply(htmltools::HTML)

pal <- colorBin(
  palette = "viridis",
  domain = Candidates$nature_dry_mean
)

l <- leaflet(data = Candidates) 
esri <- c(Esri.WorldImagery = "Esri.WorldImagery", Esri = "Esri", Esri.WorldStreetMap = "Esri.WorldStreetMap", 
Esri.DeLorme = "Esri.DeLorme", Esri.WorldTopoMap = "Esri.WorldTopoMap", 
 Esri.WorldTerrain = "Esri.WorldTerrain", 
Esri.WorldShadedRelief = "Esri.WorldShadedRelief", Esri.WorldPhysical = "Esri.WorldPhysical", 
Esri.OceanBasemap = "Esri.OceanBasemap", Esri.NatGeoWorldMap = "Esri.NatGeoWorldMap", 
Esri.WorldGrayCanvas = "Esri.WorldGrayCanvas")
for (provider in esri) {
  l <- l %>% addProviderTiles(provider, group = provider, options = providerTileOptions(minZoom = 1, maxZoom = 100))
}
l <- l %>%
  addLayersControl(baseGroups = names(esri),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = TRUE),
    overlayGroups = c("Catchment","Rewildling", "Sinks", "National Parks"))  %>%
  htmlwidgets::onRender("
    function(el, x) {
      var myMap = this;
      myMap.on('baselayerchange',
        function (e) {
          myMap.minimap.changeLayer(L.tileLayer.provider(e.name));
        })
    }") 

l %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(data = Candidates, color = ~pal(nature_dry_mean), popup = ~labels, label = ~labels) %>% 
  addLegend("bottomright", pal = pal, values = ~nature_dry_mean,
    title = "Mean dry Nature",
    opacity = 1
   ) %>% addScaleBar() %>% addMeasure(position = "bottomleft", primaryLengthUnit = "meters", primaryAreaUnit = "hectares")
```
